description: The grizzled leader of the Desert Dawn resistance group, a ragtag band of guerilla soldiers drawn from the townships of northern Africa. Although he has little use for the arrogant superpowers which make up the http://anidb.net/ch1542 [Earth Alliance], Sahib makes common cause with the http://anidb.net/ch1507 [Archangel] crew against their mutual enemy. As an old friend of http://anidb.net/ch304 [Cagalli`s] family, Sahib is one of the few resistance members who knows the secret of her true identity.
name: Sahib Ashman
